channel.title: Models
channel.description: Alright so... how do I change class8 model ints into itemDef for PI?

item.title: Models
item.dc:creator: @Tyler_Hostility Tyler_Hostility
item.description:
@Tyler_Hostility wrote:

This will for for [PI] ItemDef.java right? And thanks!

EDIT: After I add this to my ItemDef.java I should compile it again right?

item.title: Models
item.dc:creator: @Pblord7 Pblord7
item.description:
@Pblord7 wrote:

if(i == 9119) { itemDef.actions = new String[5]; itemDef.actions[1] = "Wear"; itemDef.anIntArray156 = new int[5]; itemDef.anIntArray160 = new int[5]; itemDef.anInt174 = 3288; itemDef.modelZoom = 2000; itemDef.modelRotation1 = 500; itemDef.modelRotation2 = 0; itemDef.modelOffset1 = -6; itemDef.modelOffset2 = 1; itemDef.anInt204 = 14; itemDef.anInt165 = 3287; itemDef.anInt200 = 3287; itemDef.anInt175 = -1; itemDef.anInt197 = -1; itemDef.anInt199 = -1; itemDef.name = "Death Cape"; itemDef.description = "The cape worn by masters of PKing. -Master Monk- ".getBytes(); } if(i == 13677) { itemDef.actions = new String[5]; itemDef.actions[1] = "Wear"; itemDef.anInt174 = 14125; //Inv & Ground itemDef.modelZoom = 2000; //Zoom itemDef.modelRotation1 = 572; itemDef.modelRotation2 = 0; itemDef.anInt204 = 0; itemDef.modelOffset1 = 0; itemDef.modelOffset2 = 1; itemDef.anInt165 = 14126; //Male itemDef.anInt200 = 14126; //Female itemDef.anInt175 = -1; itemDef.anInt197 = -1; itemDef.anInt199 = -1;//noteable itemDef.name = "Moderator cape"; itemDef.description = "Its A moderator Cape".getBytes(); } if(i == 13678) { itemDef.actions = new String[5]; itemDef.actions[1] = "Wear"; itemDef.anInt174 = 14127; //Inv & Ground itemDef.modelZoom = 2000; //Zoom itemDef.modelRotation1 = 572; itemDef.modelRotation2 = 0; itemDef.anInt204 = 0; itemDef.modelOffset1 = 0; itemDef.modelOffset2 = 1; itemDef.anInt165 = 14128; //Male itemDef.anInt200 = 14128; //Female itemDef.anInt175 = -1; itemDef.anInt197 = -1; itemDef.anInt199 = -1;//noteable itemDef.name = "Administrator cape"; itemDef.description = "Its an administrator cape".getBytes(); } if(i == 13679) { itemDef.actions = new String[5]; itemDef.actions[1] = "Wear"; itemDef.anInt174 = 14129; //Inv & Ground itemDef.modelZoom = 2000; //Zoom itemDef.modelRotation1 = 572; itemDef.modelRotation2 = 0; itemDef.anInt204 = 0; itemDef.modelOffset1 = 0; itemDef.modelOffset2 = 1; itemDef.anInt165 = 14130; //Male itemDef.anInt200 = 14130; //Female itemDef.anInt175 = -1; itemDef.anInt197 = -1; itemDef.anInt199 = -1;//noteable itemDef.name = "Owner cape"; itemDef.description = "Its an owner cape".getBytes(); }
